name: Bydas
tag_list: social-media, online-marketing, search-marketing, seo, social-media-marketing, webdesign, mobile, facebook, backoffice
overview:
We’re a leading internet agency from Portugal that provides services on online marketing and digital contents world wide.

We’re able to take your business up just by developing some online marketing strategies such as:

Create payed positioning campaigns like AdWords, LinkedIn Direct Ads or Facebook Ads;
Develop SEO strategies inside your website;
Manage Link Building stratefies for get more WWW authority;
Manage Social Networks Communication of your corporation by using a Community Manager inside those networks;
Manage Crisis at social media level.

We’re also specialists on implementing high-level websites platforms that uses our own CMS and a fast framework that was made to be the best for SEO strategies.

If you want to build a eCommerce System, you need to talk. We can provide you a very good and affordable opportunity to start your online store with a lot of features included:

Costumized design;
SEO friendly;
Easy to use interface;
more that 50 payment gateways;
Automatic shipping costs calculation;
iPhone compatible;
and a lot of more.

Just call us, maybe you can have a good surprise!
